Sentencas: The formation of thin tri-layers of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate (LSGM) and Gd-doped ceria (GDC) solid electrolytes was performed by electrophoretic deposition (EPD) on a Ni-YSZ anode for use in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Fabrication of GDC/LSGM/GDC tri-layers on polypyrrole-coated NiO-YSZ by electrophoretic deposition for anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: The surface of the NiO-YSZ substrate was coated with a conductive polypyrrole to provide electric conduction, which is essential for the EPD processing.
Titulo: Fabrication of GDC/LSGM/GDC tri-layers on polypyrrole-coated NiO-YSZ by electrophoretic deposition for anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: The GDC/LSGM8282/GDC laminar coating was performed by sequential deposition on the same substrate.
Titulo: Fabrication of GDC/LSGM/GDC tri-layers on polypyrrole-coated NiO-YSZ by electrophoretic deposition for anode-supported SOFC

Sentencas: The electrolyte layers were easily sintered together on the anode without cracking and peering-off at the interfaces.
Titulo: Fabrication of GDC/LSGM/GDC tri-layers on polypyrrole-coated NiO-YSZ by electrophoretic deposition for anode-supported SOFC
